item.title: SliTaz Website now in Russian
item.description: SliTaz website is now available in Russian! Hugs thanks to Aleksej Bobylev.

item.title: Getting ready for Slitaz Pro
item.description: The upcoming SliTaz professional platform is ready to be officially launched. Stay tuned!

item.title: Website Feed on Twitter and Facebook
item.description: SliTaz Website Feed is now relayed on the official SliTaz Twitter account and on Facebook :-)

item.title: English Website goes PHP
item.description: We have moved the html pages to php and improved all English website pages. It will be easier for translators and to announce any SliTaz release information.

item.title: SliTaz 4.0-RC2
item.description: SliTaz GNU/Linux 4.0-RC2 is out! Get it, boot it and help us make SliTaz 4.0 a great stable release!
